books.description: A romantic novel that delves into issues of class, marriage, and social expectations in 19th century England.

books.name: The Catcher in the Rye
books.description: A novel about teenage rebellion and angst, narrated by the disillusioned Holden Caulfield.

books.name: The Hobbit
books.description: A fantasy novel about the adventures of Bilbo Baggins, a hobbit who embarks on a quest to win a share of treasure guarded by a dragon.

books.name: Moby Dick
books.description: A novel about the obsessive quest of Captain Ahab for revenge against the white whale Moby Dick.

books.name: The Alchemist
books.description: A philosophical novel about a shepherd's journey to fulfill his personal legend.

books.name: Brave New World
books.description: A dystopian novel exploring a future society that values efficiency and conformity over individuality.

books.name: War and Peace
books.description: A historical novel that chronicles the French invasion of Russia and the impact on five aristocratic families.

books.name: The Road
books.description: A post-apocalyptic novel about a father and son's journey through a desolate landscape.

books.name: The Art of War
books.description: An ancient Chinese military treatise that has influenced Eastern and Western military thinking, business tactics, legal strategy, and more.

books.name: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.description: A book that explores the history of humankind from the Stone Age to the modern age.

books.name: The Lean Startup
books.description: A book on how today's entrepreneurs use continuous innovation to create radically successful businesses.

books.name: Thinking, Fast and Slow
books.description: A book that delves into the two systems of thought that drive our decisions: the fast, intuitive, and emotional system, and the slow, deliberate, and logical system.

books.name: Educated
books.description: A memoir about a young woman who grows up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho but eventually escapes to learn about the wider world through education.

books.name: The Four Agreements
books.description: A practical guide to personal freedom, outlining four agreements to practice for personal transformation.
